Module.Content:
<style type="text/css">
                html
				{
                    width: __UP_rdW__px;
                    height: __UP_rdH__px;
                }
				body, app-root
				{
					background: transparent;
					width: __UP_rdW__px;
					height: __UP_rdH__px;
					overflow: hidden;
				}
            </style>
            <!--<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ngx-test-app/dist/styles.3ff695c00d717f2d2a11.css">-->

            <body>
            	<app-root></app-root>
				
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-calendar-app/runtime-es2015.js" type="module"></script>
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-calendar-app/runtime-es5.js" nomodule defer></script>
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-calendar-app/polyfills-es5.js" nomodule defer></script>
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-calendar-app/polyfills-es2015.js" type="module"></script>
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-calendar-app/styles-es2015.js" type="module"></script>
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-calendar-app/styles-es5.js" nomodule defer></script>
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-calendar-app/vendor-es2015.js" type="module"></script>
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-calendar-app/vendor-es5.js" nomodule defer></script>
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-calendar-app/main-es2015.js" type="module"></script>
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-calendar-app/main-es5.js" nomodule defer></script></body>
			</body>
